Manx: Kherree: “T’eeish gra dy vel ad naisht, as t’eshyn gra nagh vel ad naisht. Nish, cre t’ou smooinaghtyn er shen?”
English: Kitty: “She says they’re engaged, and he says they’re not. Now, what do you think of that?”

Manx: Thom: “Ta mee smooinaghtyn dy jean eh goaill bing dy reaghey eh.”
English: Tom : “I think it will take a jury to decide”
